title.rendered: Horseshoe Bay Resort Unveils Only Floating Pool in North America

content.rendered:
HORSESHOE BAY, Texas, May 30, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Horseshoe Bay Resort, the AAA-Four Diamond resort nestled in the heart of Texas Hill Country, proudly announces the debut of the only Floating Pool in North America. Floating perfectly on the edge of constant-level Lake Lyndon B. Johnson (Lake LBJ), the newest offering rivals that of Lake Como bringing a new level of luxury to the Lone Star State.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/horseshoe-bay-resort-unveils-only-floating-pool-in-north-america-302159566.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com

Floating perfectly on the edge of constant-level Lake Lyndon B. Johnson (Lake LBJ), the newest offering rivals that of Lake […]
